title: Bad habit
content:
When interpolating, why does FontLab put BCPs between angled vectors?  
I find this very frustrating, it´s a lot of meaningless cleanup.  
I guess that script needs some refinement...

 [‹ Swedish characters in Fontlab](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809002146/http:/typophile.com/node/18406 "Go to previous forum topic") [masks ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809002146/http:/typophile.com/node/18506 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Toby
